testsuite.name: User Registration
testsuite.system-out:
Scenario: Successfull Registration # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripRegister.feature:7 Given Valid Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.valid_username_and_password() When The Post request send with endoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.the_post_request_send_with_endoint() Email already exist Then Validate Statuscode # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statuscode() {"success":false,"message":"Email already exists"} io.restassured.internal.RestAssuredResponseImpl@38087342 And Validate Response Body values # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_body_values()
Scenario: Regisration With Existing User # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripRegister.feature:13 Given User enter Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.user_enter_username_and_password(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | email | password | confirmpassword | | kalyani2325@gmail.com | Test@2325 | Test@2325 | | TOOLSQA.COM | Test@@123 | Test@@123 | When The Post request send with endoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.the_post_request_send_with_endoint() Email already exist Then Validate Statuscode # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statuscode() {"success":false,"message":"Email already exists"} io.restassured.internal.RestAssuredResponseImpl@5618fc1f And Validate Response Body values # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_body_values()
Scenario: Regisration with Invalid User # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripRegister.feature:22 Given User enter Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.user_enter_username_and_password(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | email | password | confirmpassword | | kalyani2325@gmail.com | Test@232 | Test@232 | When The Post request send with endoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.the_post_request_send_with_endoint() Email already exist Then Validate Statuscode # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statuscode() {"success":false,"message":"Email already exists"} io.restassured.internal.RestAssuredResponseImpl@7523d5a1 And Validate Response Body values # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_body_values()
